product_summary: Nowy is an AI-powered travel planning app that helps users create customized itineraries and discover hidden gems. It offers a variety of features, including a visual itinerary builder, a travel assistant, and a social media platform for travelers.
product_cons: Some features require a paid subscription
Can be overwhelming for first-time users

product_usecases.details: Nowy can help you plan your entire vacation, from start to finish. It can recommend destinations, create itineraries, and book flights and hotels.
Nowy can help you discover new places to visit, both near and far. It offers a variety of filters to help you find places that match your interests.
Nowy has a built-in social media platform where you can share your travel experiences with others. You can post photos, videos, and reviews, and connect with other travelers.
Nowy's travel assistant can provide you with personalized travel advice. It can answer questions about destinations, itineraries, and more.
Nowy can help you book flights, hotels, and other travel arrangements. It offers a variety of options to help you find the best deals.

product_toolfor: People who want to plan their vacations
People who want to discover new places
People who want to share their travel experiences
People who want to get travel advice
product_pricing: Nowy offers a free plan and a paid plan. The paid plan costs $4.99 per month or $49.99 per year.
